name: Portobello T-Shirt
description:
Part of our brand new Winter range of T-Shirts.

100% cotton in cherry with white Pedlars leopard head print and hand sewn labels.

Express delivery over the Christmas period is a flat rate of £7.99 and guaranteed delivery in 1-2 working days if ordered before noon. Please email info@pedlarsldn.com with your order number to arrange this service.

Size guide -  Chest (to fit)
SMALL - 34/36
MEDIUM - 38/40
LARGE - 42/44
XL - 46/48

name: Smithfield Sweatshirt
description:
Our brand Autumn/ Winter range of heavyweight 'Raglan' style sweatshirts. 

Available in military green or burgundy with white Pedlars print and hand sewn labels.

100% cotton with fleecy feel inside, perfect for the long, cold nights.

Express delivery over the Christmas period is a flat rate of £7.99 and guaranteed delivery in 1-2 working days if ordered before noon. Please email info@pedlarsldn.com with your order number to arrange this service.

Size guide -  Chest (to fit)

LARGE - 41/43
